name: Login with WMI
description: Detection of logins performed with WMI
pattern:
title: Login with WMI
id: 5af54681-df95-4c26-854f-2565e13cfab0
status: stable
description: Detection of logins performed with WMI
author: Thomas Patzke
date: 2019/12/04
tags:
    - attack.execution
    - attack.t1047
logsource:
    product: windows
    service: security
detection:
    selection:
        EventID: 4624
        ProcessName: "*\\WmiPrvSE.exe"
    condition: selection
falsepositives:
    - Monitoring tools
    - Legitimate system administration
level: low
